sentence.Network_en: Bristol Crown Court granted conditional bail with a surety of £2,500.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国布里斯托尔刑事法庭准予有条件保释，保证金为2,500英镑。

sentence.Network_en: The insurance company will take warehouse stocks or treasury bonds as surety.
sentence.Network_cn: 该保险公司将接受仓库库存货物或长期国库券作为担保。

sentence.Network_en: There is no surety he ever reached the river.
sentence.Network_cn: 不能确定他是否到过河边.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... sumptuous a 奢侈的 surety n 保证；保证人 assure v 保证；确信.
会计词汇E ... Surcharge Notice 缴纳附加费通知书 surety 保证人；担保人；担保 surety bond 担保债券；银行保证书.
岩土力学与工程 5 - 大观园的日志 - 网易博客 ... surcharge 荷载 surety 担保人，保证人 surface channel 排水明渠，地表排水沟.

list.abs: ...l bondsman）为自己作担保。保释金经纪人是独立于当事人和法庭之外的第三方，他们的公司被称为“担保公司”（surety company），是一种特殊类型的保险公司。当事人向保释金经纪人支付一定数额的保费（通常为数额的10%），保释金经纪.
石油英语词汇(S8)--石油百科 ... sure-fire firing head 保险的发火头 surety bond 担保债券；担保书 surety 保证.
2、由保证保险公司或专门的担保公司充当担保人，开具担保书（surety bond）（Surety Bond）。美国是这种“美式担保”的主要国家。
而保证保函（surety bonds）才是一个保证合同。在英国，权威学理承认信用证项下的法律关系可以使用绝大部分合同法基本法律原则。

lj.lj_ly: who can tell that for a surety?.
Alfonso agreed to stand surety for his friend's behaviour.
lj.lj_ls: 阿方索同意为他朋友的行为做担保。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'something given to support an undertaking that someone will fulfil an obligation'): from Old French surte, from Latin securitas (see security)

entry.def: A surety is money or something valuable which you give to someone to show that you will do what you have promised.

example.ex: The insurance company will take warehouse stocks or treasury bonds as surety...
example.tran: 该保险公司将接受仓库库存货物或长期国库券作为担保。

example.ex: Bristol Crown Court granted conditional bail with a surety of £2,500.
example.tran: 英国布里斯托尔刑事法庭准予有条件保释，保证金为 2,500 英镑。

means.word_mean: 2. property that your creditor can claim in case you default on your obligation;

sentences.sentence: "bankers are reluctant to lend without good security"

means.word_mean: 3. a prisoner who is held by one party to insure that another party will meet specified terms
4. one who provides a warrant or guarantee to another
5. a guarantee that an obligation will be met

auth_sentence.content: The surety of the chassis over the suspension is eerie.
auth_sentence.res_content: The surety of the chassis over the suspension is eerie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The surety of the chassis over the suspension is eerie.

auth_sentence.content: But we also cannot manufacture without having some surety of infrastructure support.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we also cannot manufacture without having some surety of infrastructure support.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we also cannot manufacture without having some surety of infrastructure support.

auth_sentence.content: But there's something in the familiar surety of her rejection that niggles.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there's something in the familiar surety of her rejection that niggles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there's something in the familiar surety of her rejection that niggles.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑
